ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: This work was financially supported by the Young Scientists Fund of the National Natural Science Foundation of China (31501584), the Fundamental Research Funds for the Central Universities of Shaanxi Normal University, China, (2017CSY023 and GK201601007). And this study was also supported by the Nutrition and Functional Food Innovation Team of Institute of Food Science and Technology CAAS; the authors would like to express their appreciation for the assistance provided.
